message:
The American website Politico: Biden is pessimistic about a ceasefire between Hamas and Israel.

According to the website, Biden expressed doubts that a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas will come soon... according to him "Hamas needs to move".... At the same time, he "hasn't lose hope yet".

Biden's words were said during the G7 summit being held in Italy.
event_breakdown: * Biden pessimistic about a ceasefire between Hamas and Israel, doubts it will come soon.
